docs.snippet: Renewed pressure against the European exchanges took toll in a number of substantial declines yesterday Business was extremely active, bankers and dealers being involved in the busiest half-session in months.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 8.--A new high mark for Latin-American loans was made in the United States in 1927, when American underwriters publicly offered Government securities of a par value of $335,360,300, as compared with $317,208,200 in 1926. The recent...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 8.--A new high mark for Latin-American loans was made in the United States in 1927, when American underwriters publicly offered Government securities of a par value of $335,360,300, as compared with $317,208,200 in 1926. The recent floatation of a $50,000,000 loan to Peru established this financing record.

headline.main: HIGH MARK IN LOANS TO LATIN-AMERICA; Total Borrowed Here in 1926 Was $317,208,000 and in 1927 $335,360,000. ARGENTINA AGAIN LED LIST Flotations by 12 Countries Comprised 36.5 Per Cent. of Aggregate of Foreign Issues.

docs.snippet: MANAGUA, Jan. 11.--Two attempts during the past twenty-four hours to ambush columns of United States marines moving into position for their expected general attack on the rebel forces of General Augustino Sandino were broken up with losses to...
docs.lead_paragraph: MANAGUA, Jan. 11.--Two attempts during the past twenty-four hours to ambush columns of United States marines moving into position for their expected general attack on the rebel forces of General Augustino Sandino were broken up with losses to Sandinistas, according to reports to Marine headquarters here today.
docs.abstract: Defeats 2 attempts by Sandinistos to ambush U S forces

headline.main: MARINES KILL 14 IN NICARAGUA FIGHTS; They Defeat Two Attempts of Sandinistas to Ambush Them --Airmen Account for 9. OUR MEN TAKE SAN ALBINO Haiti Bandit-Fighter Assumes Command--Bogota Press Protests to Coolidge. New York Peace Body Leaves. MARINES KILL 14 IN NICARAGUA FIGHTS Bluejackets Guard Bridge. Colombian Protest to Coolidge. Echo at Havana Is Predicted. Argentinians Attack Us.
